full_text: Boooooo @Fanatics .. no Saint Peter’s March Madness merch?? As a former Peacock student athlete, it’s very disappointing! The other 15 schools have plenty of Sweet Sixteen/MM gear available, but no love for the talk of the tournament?? #WakeUp @PeacocksMBB

Sweet Freakin 16!!!! Couldn’t be more proud to be a Peacock Alum & Student Athlete!! So thrilled for the entire school and athletic department! Hats off to Shaheen Holloway, pay that man!!!!!! @PeacocksMBB @SPUAthletics @saintpetersuniv https://t.co/2HJagV8O52
